subject: Travel
title: The Great Wall of China
description: A quick win: understand The Great Wall of China.

hook.text: The Great Wall stretches over 13,000 miles. It took more than 2,000 years to build.

buildup.text: Construction began in the 7th century BC to keep out nomadic invaders from the north.

discovery.text: It's not one wall but many, built by different dynasties and later connected together.

twist.text: The wall often failed as a barrier. Invaders simply bribed guards or found gaps.

climax.text: Today it is China's most visited monument, drawing over 10 million tourists each year.

punchline.text: The wall failed as defense but succeeded as a symbol.

quiz.question: How long is the Great Wall of China?
